CustomField.formula:
CASE( Integration_Remarks_Image__c,
'Red',IMAGE('https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?chst=d_text_outline&chld=F96315|15|l|ffffff|_|To be Pushed','HOT'), 'Green',IMAGE('https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?chst=d_text_outline&chld=006666|15|l|ffffff|_|Pushed Successfully','GREEN'), NULL)
CustomField.label: Integration Remarks
